content.webTitle: The Radio Times Story by Tony Currie, foreword by John Peel

fields.headline: The Radio Times Story by Tony Currie, foreword by John Peel
fields.bodyText: (Kelly, £18.95) From its first issue in 1923 to today, the Radio Times provides an insight into broadcasting as well as mere listings. Tony Currie has been collecting issues since 1956. In a book that will be invaluable to media-studies courses, he supplies history, analysis and illustrations which (given the threat to print archives everywhere) may soon be unavailable. The covers - from English country churchyards to The Simpsons - index our changing preoccupations.
